page.title: 16STATISTICAL SURVEY CARCROFT
page.content: Based on 144 families whose children attend Carcroft Middle School.77.7% of completed forms returned.{HOUSING}-45% terrace,52%-semi-detached,3% detached,0% flats.{AGE OF HOME}-4.4% under 5yrs,23% 5-10 yrs,17% 10-20yrs,21%20-50yrs,14%50-70 yrs,14%70-100yrs,1%over100yrs.{HOME {OCCUPANTS-}2-0%,3-21%,4-36%,5-29%,6-9% 7-3% 8-2%, 9-1%. {TIME SPENT IN ONE {HOUSE}-1yr-5% 1-5yrs-31%,5-10yrs-33% 10-15yrs-20% 15-20yrs-7%,20+yrs-3%. DISTANCE TO WORk{-1mile-14%,1-2ml.-3%} {2-5 ml.-20%}10+ml.-9%,5%-varies,29% do not travel to work.{CAR OWNERSHIP}-1 car-49%,1+ car-3%,no car-48%.{ORIGINS {OF PEOPLE}- 28%-Carcroft,72%-Outside Carcroft.Of these72% came from the S. Yorks area. 28% from Birmingham Co.Durham Derby Reading Sunderland Devon Halifax Leeds Lincoln North'ants Nottingham Oxford Scotland Wales .
